Text: does anyone know how to fix the "error loading saved game" thing? like when you are leaving the school to fight the bandits it just says error loading the saved game and quits the game for me. have tried to reinstall it but it still wont work. Can anyone help me plz?
Does anyone know how to fix the small problem where it doesn't run at all?

Seed.
